1.content: Choose one to cut your hair
1.title: Who’s cutting your hair?

152.content:
You were 17 years old not too much older than your sister Jillian. Jillian was 16 and she was short with medium length bleach blonde hair. Your parents were away because it was their anniversary and they were going out on a date so you and her were left home alone.

How do you get your haircut?
152.title: Younger

choices: The Pet Salon: Special Sports Edition.
154.content: Instead of human characters what if there was an animated anthropomorphic dog that one day goes to a special pet salon whereas they not only have their usual clientele they cater to but also animated anthropomorphic animal professional wrestlers and sumo wrestlers who usually get their haircut and also groomed as well?
154.title: Other

info.brief_description: This is a story that will revolve around a character that gets a haircut
info.description:
Choose your character to play the story as and see where the journey takes you.

- NO RULES
